changeSet.author: maimoonak
changeSet.comment: Adding location attribute types (identifier,location type,organization type,organization name)
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `location_attribute_type` (`name`,`description`,`datatype`,`datatype_config`,`preferred_handler`,`handler_config`, `min_occurs`,`creator`,`date_created`,`retired`,`uuid`) VALUES ('Identifier', 'Identifier associated with location; DONOT modify - Used in eLIMS to identify locations and labs', 'org.openmrs.customdatatype.datatype.FreeTextDatatype', null, null, null, 0, 1, NOW(), 0, UUID()), ('Location Type', 'Location type; DONOT modify - Used in eLIMS to manage labs', 'org.openmrs.customdatatype.datatype.SpecifiedTextOptionsDatatype', null, 'org.openmrs.web.attribute.handler.SpecifiedTextOptionsDropdownHandler', 'DEFAULT,Microscopy Lab,CXR Lab,GeneXpert Lab', 0, 1, NOW(), 0, UUID()), ('Organization Type', 'Location administration type; DONOT modify - Used in eLIMS to manage labs', 'org.openmrs.customdatatype.datatype.SpecifiedTextOptionsDatatype', null, 'org.openmrs.web.attribute.handler.SpecifiedTextOptionsDropdownHandler', 'DEFAULT,GOVT,NGO', 0, 1, NOW(), 0, UUID()), ('Organization Name', 'Location administrator organization; DONOT modify - Used in eLIMS to manage labs', 'org.openmrs.customdatatype.datatype.FreeTextDatatype', null, null, null, 0, 1, NOW(), 0, UUID());

changeSet.author: maimoonak
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `location_attribute_type` (`name`,`description`,`datatype`,`datatype_config`,`preferred_handler`,`handler_config`, `min_occurs`,`creator`,`date_created`,`retired`,`uuid`) VALUES ('Registration Date', 'Location registration date; DONOT modify - Used in eLIMS to manage labs', 'org.openmrs.customdatatype.datatype.DateDatatype', null, 'org.openmrs.web.attribute.handler.DateFieldGenDatatypeHandler', null, 0, 1, NOW(), 0, UUID());

changeSet.author: maimoonak
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `tbelims_device` ( `device_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `android_id` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `mac_id` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `serial_id` varchar(45) DEFAULT NULL, `last_count` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `last_sync_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`device_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

changeSet.author: maimoonak
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE tbelims_device ADD COLUMN `name` varchar(255), ADD COLUMN `description` varchar(1000), ADD COLUMN `creator` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', ADD COLUMN `date_created` datetime default null, ADD COLUMN `changed_by` int(11) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `date_changed` datetime default NULL, ADD COLUMN `retired` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', ADD COLUMN `retired_by` int(11) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `date_retired` datetime default NULL, ADD COLUMN `retire_reason` varchar(255) default NULL, ADD COLUMN `uuid` char(38) NOT NULL, ADD COLUMN `location_id` int(11) default null;

changeSet.author: maimoonak
